封.definition: to confer; to grant; to bestow a title; to seal; classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

封丘.definition: Fengqiu county in Xinxiang 新鄉|新乡[Xin1 xiang1], Henan

封丘縣.definition: Fengqiu county in Xinxiang 新鄉|新乡[Xin1 xiang1], Henan

封凍.definition: to freeze over (of water or land)

封口.definition: to close up; to heal (of wound); to keep one's lips sealed

封土.definition: to heap earth (to close a tomb); a mound (covering a tomb)

封地.definition: feudal fiefdom; land held as a vassal in feudal society; enfeoffment

封妻蔭子.definition: to bestow a title on the wife of a deserving official and make his son heir to his titles

封存.definition: to sequester; to seal up (for safe keeping); to freeze (an account); to mothball

封官許願.definition: to offer official positions and material benefits in order to buy people's allegiance

封山育林.definition: to restrict access to a mountainous area to promote natural forest regeneration

封底.definition: the back cover of a book

封建.definition: system of enfeoffment; feudalism; feudal; feudalistic

封檐板.definition: barge board; weather board; eaves board (construction)

封殺.definition: to shut out; to block; to smother

封沙育林.definition: to restrict access to a sandy area to promote natural forest regeneration

封河期.definition: freezing over of river in winter

封火.definition: to cover a fire (to make it burn slowly)

封爵.definition: to confer a title; to ennoble; to knight; title of nobility

封王.definition: to win the championship; (of an emperor) to bestow the title of king on a subject

封疆.definition: border region; regional general acting as governor (in Ming and Qing times)

封神榜.definition: Investiture of the Gods, major Ming dynasty vernacular novel of mythology and fantasy, very loosely based on King Wu of Zhou's 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] overthrow of the Shang, subsequent material for opera, film, TV series, computer games etc

封神演義.definition: Investiture of the Gods, major Ming dynasty vernacular novel of mythology and fantasy, very loosely based on King Wu of Zhou's 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] overthrow of the Shang, subsequent material for opera, film, TV series, computer games etc

封禁.definition: to ban (narcotics, a movie etc); to block (a road etc); (Internet) to block (a user)

封禪.definition: (of an emperor) to pay homage to Heaven at Mount Tai and to Earth at Mount Liangfu

封網.definition: to intercept at the net (volleyball, tennis etc); (computing) to seal off a network

封蓋.definition: cap; seal; cover; to cover; blocked shot (basketball)

封號.definition: (archaic) title granted to a person; to ban an (online) account

封裝.definition: to encapsulate; to enclose; to wrap; to seal inside

封裡.definition: inside front cover (sometimes refers to both inside front and inside back covers)

封裹.definition: to wrap up; to pack up

封路.definition: road closure; to close a road

封邑.definition: grant of territory by an emperor or monarch (old)

封鎖.definition: to blockade; to seal off; to lock down

封閉.definition: to close; to seal off; to close down (an illegal venue); closed (i.e. isolated from outside input)

封閉性開局.definition: Closed Game; Double Queen Pawn Opening (chess); same as 雙后前兵開局|双后前兵开局

封開.definition: Fengkai county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong

封開縣.definition: Fengkai county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong

封頂.definition: to put a roof (on a building); to cap the roof (finishing a building project); fig. to put a ceiling (on spending, prize, ambition etc); to top off; fig. to reach the highest point (of growth, profit, interest rates); to stop growing (of plant bud or branch)

封頂儀式.definition: ceremony of capping the roof (to mark the completion of a building project)

封齋.definition: fast (in several religions); Ramadan (Islam); see also 齋月|斋月[Zhai1 yue4]
